content: a cute and eyecatching tulip scrunchie is waiting for you and this one you ll get to crochet yourself the pdf pattern contains detailed instructions and lots of pictures to help you make this scrunchie ✨ product info ✨ difficulty intermediate the pattern is written in us terminology what is needed - yarn of your choice - crochet hook based on what your yarn requires - darning needle - scissors - ponytail i used yarnart begonia and kartopu organica cotton yarns to create this scrunchie the yarn usage is about 10 g in total including all colors used to make the scrunchie please note that the pattern doesn t include a diagram we also have a bandana in the tulip accessories set find the pattern for the bandana here https //islandmagic store/products/crochet-pattern-tulip-b
